title: Ticket #1034: Enable soap test on Windows
description:
The SOAP tests are not run on Windows. We know there are numerous users of the SOAP interface on Windows. Before the 7.4 series, we had a number of SOAP related issues that were specific to Windows. The way SOAP is built on Windows recently changed, see #1024.

The SOAP tests need to be enabled on Windows.
